$name may be longing for a past experience where they felt flow! Nostalgia is a fine place to visit - temporarily. Use nostalgia as a staging ground to help $name determine where they want to head next.

Be cautious not let someone linger too long in nostalgia as it could quickly devolve into either boredom or apathy! Try to learn about the kind of work that most motivates $name and endeavour to craft new scenarios that speaks to $name most closely.
